description:
Lulu`s Sunflora helps Lulu runs a berry farm near Suiren Town in the Sinnoh region. Lulu has quite a few Sunflora and they all help her by wearing watering cans on their back to water all the berries on the farm.
Team Rocket`s Meowth dressed up as one of the Sunflora in an attempt to steal some of the berries. Lulu fell for it as it was dark and they were able to put their plan in motion.
name: Kimawari (Lulu)
